items.summary: Update the backend subscription plan data model in `backend/main.mo` to reflect the following exact pricing and limits for all three tiers and four billing cycles. Basic: 30 faculty, 500 PDFs, 2 licenses — Monthly ₹8,000, Quarterly ₹25,000, Half-yearly ₹50,000, Yearly ₹1,00,000. Premium: 100 faculty, 2000 PDFs, 4 licenses — Monthly ₹16,500, Quarterly ₹50,000, Half-yearly ₹1,00,000, Yearly ₹2,00,000. Diamond: 500 faculty, 5000 PDFs, 6 licenses — Monthly ₹33,000, Quarterly ₹1,00,000, Half-yearly ₹2,00,000, Yearly ₹4,00,000. Each plan variant must store: tier name, billing cycle label, faculty limit, PDF limit, license count, and price in INR. Ensure the default plan (used on first deploy or when no plan has been explicitly selected) is set to Basic Monthly with its correct limits.

Update the plan tier configuration object in `frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts` (and any other frontend location where plan data is hardcoded, such as `frontend/src/components/SubscriptionSection.tsx`) to match the updated pricing, limits, and license counts exactly: Basic (30 faculty, 500 PDFs, 2 licenses), Premium (100 faculty, 2000 PDFs, 4 licenses), Diamond (500 faculty, 5000 PDFs, 6 licenses), with all four billing cycle prices as specified. Each plan card in the Subscription Management section must display the license count (e.g., '2 Licenses') alongside the faculty limit, PDF limit, and price.
